original_title: UFC Fight Night 140: Magny vs. Ponzinibbio
overview: UFC Fight Night 140: Magny vs. Ponzinibbio was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on November 17, 2018 at Estadio Mary Ter√°n de Weiss in Buenos Aires, Argentina. A welterweight bout between Neil Magny and Santiago Ponzinibbio headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 140: Magny vs. Ponzinibbio
